title: Ep 528 | Sadie Robertson Huff's New Album Is Fire & Phil Wants This on a T-Shirt
description:
Phil tells of the startling time somebody gave him a piece of his mind. Jase talks about how young people will have "Noah" moments. Al talks about what young people are tempted to be concerned about in their daily lives and how God is fully aware when bad things happen to His creation. Jase is back on a movie kick, and he reveals which mission is truly impossible for humanity to carry out. Sadie's new worship EP "Steady Light" is out, and Zach's daughter sings on it! And Phil approves a great new T-shirt idea.

Listen to the new LO Worship EP "Steady Light": https://lnk.to/LOWorship

https://talkshop.live/watch/kNa2Qoub38oD — The ONLY place to get your signed copy of "Your Daily Phil" by Phil Robertson

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Visit https://BoxofAwesome.com and use code: PHIL and get 20% off your first box

Visit https://CovEyes.com/PHIL and get a FREE 30 day trial with the promo code: PHIL
-
